review: We love all of our Fire products.  Took a little bit to figure out how to stream some off of some things but it works with just about everything we want it to work with.  Would suggest this over Roku or Chromecast.

review: Love it!! Our 'smart tv' in the bedroom did not give us ability to use amazon and we purchase movies on amazon. So we got the fire stick and it has been great! It was super easy to set up and we were on it very quickly. Well worth the money!
